item.title: Rule of the game
item.description: window.xaringanExtraClipboard(null, {"button":"Copy Code","success":"Copied!","error":"Press Ctrl+C to Copy"}) Welcome to the Introduction to Research, Innovation & Development course! We look forward to meeting you. In order to have a common understanding about the development of the course, we’ll have to consider the following elements: Game rule for each session Planning Grades The final grade is composed of two main elements: There is an activity to summit on ARCHE at the end of each session.
